name: Lawnmower Dreams Demo
description:
In 1988, Advanced Lawnmower simulator for the ZX Spectrum appeared. This gave us a glimpse into a future world of exciting lawnmower simulations.  For some reason or other this future never appeared. To put this right, I introduce to you Lawnmower Dreams. 

Your aim is to prove to the people of NASA you have the right stuff to mow the lawn on the moon! 

This demo version features the first three challenges set by NASA 

WASD Keys to move, Mouse to enjoy the view. 

Game also features

  • Original ZX Spectrum Colour Palette 
  • Less bugs than anything Bethesda has put out 
  • Realistic lawnmower handling courtesy of LawnMowerPhysics(TM) * 

* may not actually be realistic.
